Text.Language: O God, be mindful to my help; make haste, O Lord, to help me. Let them be ashamed and be scorned, those who seek my soul; let them be turned backward and put to shame, those who wish to do evil unto me. Let those who say to me, â€œAha, aha,â€? be turned back in shame immediately. Let all who seek You exult and be glad in You, and let those who love Your salvation say continually, â€œLet the Lord be magnified.â€? But I am poor and weak, O God, help me. You are my Helper and Savior, O Lord, do not delay. ALLELUIA.
